meta.name: google-site-verification

div.title: Friendly House Logo - Translucent with white roof.png

span.span: To empower Arizona communities through education and human services.

We are a multi-service organization with wide-ranging programs aimed at addressing the pressing needs of our diverse community. Our efforts have resulted in building resilient communities that are helping spur economic development, stabilize neighborhoods and revitalize our city.

h6.span: Due to ongoing concerns regarding public health, Friendly House will not be holding registration or classes until further notice. For more information, please visit our website at www.friendlyhouse.org or call (602) 257-0286.

Debido a las inquietudes actuales con respecto a la salud pública, Friendly House no llevará a cabo el registro o las clases hasta nuevo aviso. Para obtener más información, visite nuestro sitio web en www.friendlyhouse.org o llame al (602) 257-0286.

span.span: Send a message to the immigration & legal services

Friendly House Inc. is a tax-exempt nonprofit 501(c)(3) and is eligible to receive tax-deductible contributions and foundation grants. If you are interested in donating to support any of our programs, please mail your check to:
